trans-unit.source: DirectShow device selection
trans-unit.target: DirectShow device selection

trans-unit.source: configure YouTube Live.
trans-unit.target: configure YouTube Live.

trans-unit.source: -glob glob pattern of files to stream e.g. "*.avi"
trans-unit.target: -glob glob pattern of files to stream e.g. "*.avi"

trans-unit.source: -image filename of image to use as stream background (REQUIRED for most websites)
trans-unit.target: -image filename of image to use as stream background (REQUIRED for most websites)

trans-unit.source: -image if you have AUDIO files, you should normally set an image to display, as most/all streaming sites REQUIRE a video feed--even a static image.
trans-unit.target: -image if you have AUDIO files, you should normally set an image to display, as most/all streaming sites REQUIRE a video feed--even a static image.

trans-unit.source: -loop optionally loop endlessly the globbed file list
trans-unit.target: -loop optionally loop endlessly the globbed file list

trans-unit.source: -nometa disable Title - Artist text overlay
trans-unit.target: -nometa disable Title - Artist text overlay

trans-unit.source: -shuffle optionally shuffle the globbed file list
trans-unit.target: -shuffle optionally shuffle the globbed file list

trans-unit.source: PyLivestream.get_framerate(vidfn) gives the frames/sec of a video file.
trans-unit.target: PyLivestream.get_framerate(vidfn) gives the frames/sec of a video file.

trans-unit.source: PyLivestream.get_resolution(vidfn) gives the resolution (width x height) of video file.
trans-unit.target: PyLivestream.get_resolution(vidfn) gives the resolution (width x height) of video file.

trans-unit.source: audio_bps: audio data rate--leave blank if you want no audio (usually used for "file", to make an animated GIF in post-processing)
trans-unit.target: audio_bps : audio data rate--leave blank if you want no audio (usually used for "file", to make an animated GIF in post-processing)

trans-unit.source: audiofs: audio sampling frequency. Typically 44100 Hz (CD quality).
trans-unit.target: audiofs : audio sampling frequency. Typically 44100 Hz (CD quality).

trans-unit.source: glob_pattern e.g. *.avi pattern matching video files
trans-unit.target: glob_pattern e.g. *.avi pattern matching video files

trans-unit.source: import pylivestream.api as pls from within your Python script. For more information type help(pls) or help(pls.stream_microphone)
trans-unit.target: import pylivestream.api as pls from within your Python script. For more information type help(pls) or help(pls.stream_microphone)

trans-unit.source: path path to where video files are
trans-unit.target: path path to where video files are

trans-unit.source: preset: veryfast or ultrafast if CPU not able to keep up.
trans-unit.target: preset : veryfast or ultrafast if CPU not able to keep up.

trans-unit.source: screencap_fps: frames/sec of screen capture
trans-unit.target: screencap_fps : frames/sec of screen capture

trans-unit.source: screencap_origin: origin (upper left corner) of screen capture region in pixels.
trans-unit.target: screencap_origin : origin (upper left corner) of screen capture region in pixels.

trans-unit.source: screencap_res: resolution of screen capture (area to capture, starting from origin)
trans-unit.target: screencap_res : resolution of screen capture (area to capture, starting from origin)

trans-unit.source: site is facebook, periscope, youtube, etc.
trans-unit.target: site is facebook , periscope , youtube , etc.

trans-unit.source: video_kbps: override automatic video bitrate in kbps
trans-unit.target: video_kbps : override automatic video bitrate in kbps

trans-unit.source: webcam_fps: webcam fps -- found from command above or webcam spec sheet
trans-unit.target: webcam_fps : webcam fps -- found from command above or webcam spec sheet

trans-unit.source: webcam_res: webcam resolution -- find from v4l2-ctl --list-formats-ext or webcam spec sheet.
trans-unit.target: webcam_res : webcam resolution -- find from v4l2-ctl --list-formats-ext or webcam spec sheet.

trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: Autenticación

trans-unit.source: Black / Blank desktop sharing video. In general since this program generates command lines that are run by FFmpeg, try just using FFmpeg by itself to write to a video file. This is a known issue with Wayland--instead use X11. See FFmpeg Desktop capture docs.
trans-unit.target: Black / Blank desktop sharing video. In general since this program generates command lines that are run by FFmpeg, try just using FFmpeg by itself to write to a video file. This is a known issue with Wayland--instead use X11. See FFmpeg Desktop capture docs.

trans-unit.source: Captions: if you have installed the optional tinytag Python module, the Title - Artist will be added automatically onto the video from the audio/video files.
trans-unit.target: Captions: if you have installed the optional tinytag Python module, the Title - Artist will be added automatically onto the video from the audio/video files.

trans-unit.source: DirectShow didn't work for me on Windows 10, so I used gdigrab instead.
trans-unit.target: DirectShow no me funcionó en Windows 10,así que usé gdigrab en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: Disregard this warning as long as your image looks OK.
trans-unit.target: Ignora esta advertencia siempre y cuando tu imagen se vea bien.

trans-unit.source: Do Skype / Duo / FaceTime work excellently for you on your network? If not, live streaming will not work well.
trans-unit.target: ¿Skype/Duo/FaceTime funcionan excelentemente para ti en tu red? Si no,la transmisión en vivo no funcionará bien.

trans-unit.source: Due to the complexity of streaming and the non-specific error codes FFmpeg emits, the default behavior is that if FFmpeg detects one stream has failed, ALL streams will stop streaming and the program ends.
trans-unit.target: Debido a la complejidad de la transmisión y a los códigos de error no específicos que FFmpeg emite,el comportamiento por defecto es que si FFmpeg detecta que una transmisión ha fallado,TODAS las transmisiones dejarán de transmitirse y el programa terminará.

trans-unit.target: Cada computadora necesitará parámetros de entrada distintos del dispositivo pylivestream.ini:

trans-unit.target: Edit file youtube.key to have the YouTube hexadecimal stream key

trans-unit.source: I prefer using the Phone method as then the phone is a "second screen" where I can see if the stream is lagging, and if I "leave broadcast" and come back in, I can comment from my phone etc.
trans-unit.target: Prefiero usar el método del teléfono ya que entonces el teléfono es una "segunda pantalla" donde puedo ver si el flujo se retrasa,y si "salgo de la emisión" y vuelvo a entrar,puedo comentar desde mi teléfono etc.

trans-unit.source: Stream References
trans-unit.target: Referencias de la corriente

trans-unit.source: Stream to multiple sites, in this example Periscope and YouTube Live simultaneously:
trans-unit.target: Transmitir a múltiples sitios,en este ejemplo Periscopio y YouTube en vivo simultáneamente:

trans-unit.source: Streams to one or multiple streaming sites simultaneously, using pure object-oriented Python (no extra packages) and FFmpeg. Tested with flake8, mypy type checking and pytest. visual_tests.py is a quick check of several command line scripting scenarios on your laptop. FFmpeg is used from Python subprocess to stream to sites including:
trans-unit.target: Streams to one or multiple streaming sites simultaneously, using pure object-oriented Python (no extra packages) and FFmpeg. Tested with flake8 , mypy type checking and pytest . visual_tests.py is a quick check of several command line scripting scenarios on your laptop. FFmpeg is used from Python subprocess to stream to sites including:

trans-unit.source: The pylivestream.ini file contains parameters relevant to your stream. This file is copied into your sys.prefix/share/pylivestream directory upon pip install pylivestream.
trans-unit.target: The pylivestream.ini file contains parameters relevant to your stream. This file is copied into your sys.prefix /share/pylivestream directory upon pip install pylivestream .

trans-unit.source: The [DEFAULT] section has parameters that can be overridden for each site, if desired.
trans-unit.target: The [DEFAULT] section has parameters that can be overridden for each site, if desired.

trans-unit.source: The program will load a *.key file according to the configuration file key for the website. For example, Periscope expects to see the stream hexadecimal key in ~/periscope.key, as obtained from phone Periscope app. Likewise, YouTube expects a file ~/youtube.key with the hexadecimal stream key and so on.
trans-unit.target: The program will load a *.key file according to the configuration file key for the website. For example, Periscope expects to see the stream hexadecimal key in ~/periscope.key , as obtained from phone Periscope app. Likewise, YouTube expects a file ~/youtube.key with the hexadecimal stream key and so on.

trans-unit.source: The stream's current bitrate is lower than the recommended bitrate.
trans-unit.target: La tasa de bits actual de la corriente es inferior a la recomendada.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to start a stream (assuming you've configured as per following sections). Both do the same thing.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos maneras de iniciar un flujo (suponiendo que se ha configurado según las siguientes secciones).Ambas hacen lo mismo.

trans-unit.source: This script saves your screen capture to a file on your disk:
trans-unit.target: Este guión guarda su captura de pantalla en un archivo de su disco:

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: Solución de problemas

trans-unit.source: Try a wired (Ethernet) connection to the Internet. I have seen very expensive consumer WiFi APs that had bad performance in real world strenuous use (like live streaming).
trans-unit.target: Intenta una conexión por cable (Ethernet)a Internet.He visto puntos de acceso WiFi muy caros para el consumidor que tenían un mal rendimiento en el mundo real de uso extenuante (como el streaming en vivo).

trans-unit.target: crear una nueva corriente por EITHER:

trans-unit.source: create stream from Twitch Dashboard. If you are not in the Northeast US, edit pylivestream.ini to have the closest server.
trans-unit.target: create stream from Twitch Dashboard. If you are not in the Northeast US, edit pylivestream.ini to have the closest server.

trans-unit.source: does not auto-restart if network connection glitches
trans-unit.target: does not auto-restart if network connection glitches

trans-unit.source: exe: override path to desired FFmpeg executable. In case you have multiple FFmpeg versions installed (say, from Anaconda Python).
trans-unit.target: exe:anular el camino al ejecutable deseado de la FFmpeg.En caso de que tengas varias versiones de FFmpeg instaladas (por ejemplo,de Anaconda Python).

trans-unit.source: from computer web browser, go to Periscope Producer and Create New Source.
trans-unit.target: from computer web browser, go to Periscope Producer and Create New Source.

trans-unit.source: from phone Periscope app, go to Profile -> Settings -> Periscope Producer and see your Stream Key. The "checking source" button will go to "preview stream" once you do step #2.
trans-unit.target: from phone Periscope app, go to Profile -> Settings -> Periscope Producer and see your Stream Key. The "checking source" button will go to "preview stream" once you do step #2.

trans-unit.source: gdigrab
trans-unit.target: gdigrab

trans-unit.source: generally does not work from Windows Subsystem for Linux 1 because of lack of hardware interface in WSL1. It works fine from native Windows.
trans-unit.target: generalmente no funciona desde el subsistema de Windows para Linux 1 debido a la falta de interfaz de hardware en WSL1.Funciona bien desde el Windows nativo.

trans-unit.source: is intended as a bare minimum command generator to run the FFmpeg program
trans-unit.target: está pensado como un mínimo generador de comandos para ejecutar el programa FFmpeg

trans-unit.source: is not intended for bidirectional robust streaming--consider a program/system based on Jitsi for that.
trans-unit.target: no está pensada para una transmisión bidireccional robusta,considere para ello un programa/sistema basado en Jitsi.

trans-unit.source: live streaming takes an excellent quality (not necessarily high speed) Internet connection in general. Some DSL / wireless internet provider have really spotty performance. You might not notice this with HD Netflix due to deep buffering, but it will show up on livestreaming.
trans-unit.target: La transmisión en vivo requiere una conexión a Internet de excelente calidad (no necesariamente de alta velocidad)en general.Algunos proveedores de Internet ADSL/inalámbrico tienen un rendimiento muy irregular.Puede que no lo notes con HD Netflix debido al profundo buffering,pero aparecerá en el livestreaming.

trans-unit.source: once you get a setup working once, you don't even need Python anymore--just copy and paste the command line
trans-unit.target: una vez que tienes una configuración funcionando una vez,ya ni siquiera necesitas Python...sólo tienes que copiar y pegar la línea de comandos

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: lub

trans-unit.target: o dondequiera que esté tu archivo de imagen.
